Suggestions to improve based on the dataframe:  
Cleaniness: Increase the percentage of cleaniness by introducing more effective cleaning methods or better supervisors.

Amenities: Increase the percentage of amenities by providing updated amenities that can cater to the needs of all guests.

Location: Increase the percentage of location by finding a better location to set up the business or enhancing its visibility.

Services: Increase the percentage of services by providing better customer service and providing more options for customers.

General: Increase the percentage of general by increasing efforts on overall customer satisfaction, providing superior experience for customers and a great environment.

Value: Increase the percentage of value by offering competitive prices and discounts for customers.
